price: Ata thanë: “Këto janë ëndrra të ngatërruara e ne nuk dimë t’i shpjegojmë.”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَضۡغَٰثُ أَحۡلَٰمٖۖ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِتَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحۡلَٰمِ بِعَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qālū aḍghāthu aḥlāmin wamā naḥnu bitawīli al-aḥlāmi biʿālimīna
